name: I'd Like to Tell a Story
name_original: I'd Like to Tell a Story
description:
The world works in a weird way. No one entity in this world is able to comprehend how everything works the way it does in a single lifetime. I would like to tell you a story about that.

Changelog:

v1.0
Added the game

v1.1
Added more levels
Added post processing effects
More snappy jumps

v1.1.1
Variable jump height
Bug fixes
